mapper.insert: insert into branch_table (id, tenant_id, branch_id, branch_area_id, code, name, num, type, status, memo, create_by, create_at, last_update_by, last_update_at, is_deleted, version, local_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{branchAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{localId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update:
update branch_table
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_area_id = #{branchAreaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_update_by = #{lastUpdateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_at = #{lastUpdateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
local_id = #{localId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM branch_table b WHERE b.tenant_id=${tenantId} AND b.branch_id=${branchId} AND is_deleted=0 AND id=#{id}
SELECT MAX(b.code) FROM branch_table b where b.tenant_id=${tenantId} AND b.branch_id =${branchId} AND b.branch_area_id = #{areaId} AND b.code LIKE '${areaCode}%' AND LENGTH(b.code)=4
